trends: There has been one other sighting in Bunn
There were no other sightings in Bunn on or around January 23rd 2013
Summary: Red ball bee like movements above tree tops
divs: sighting detailsaround 10pm i was outside walking my dogs. i looked over toward my neighbor's house and noticed a red ball,at first thought it was an airplane, but noticed it didn't have any white lights, it was just red. it appeared to be doing the same movements as a bee would ,dipping down and up slowly. it was about 15 to 20 ft above the tree tops probably about 1\2 mile away. at one point it stopped moving for a few seconds then carried on its steady path toward the direction of us64. i ran inside to have my husband come look but it was just moving out of our sight behind trees. my husband said maybe it was a helicopter. but i didn't hear a helicopter at all.
